segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on those cookies, completely ignoring the fact that his stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry seeing him take such a risk just for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for a cookie, and he doesn't even seem to care about her safety either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and he's just standing there like it's nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how reckless he's being, all for a handful of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor makes it even more dangerous, and he doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he realizes the danger before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting at him to be careful, but I know he can't hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR
